name: amasty/module-shopby-subscription-package-pro
description: Shopby Subscription Package Pro by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-shopby-hyva-compatibility: Install module-shopby-hyva-compatibility module to activate the integration with Hyva Theme
suggest.amasty/module-shop-by-base-hyva-compatib: Install module-shop-by-base-hyva-compatibility module to activate the integration Base module with Hyva Theme
suggest.amasty/module-shop-by-brand-hyva-compati: Install module-shop-by-brand-hyva-compatibility module to activate the integration Brand module with Hyva Theme
suggest.amasty/module-shopby-grouped-options-hyv: Install module-shop-by-brand-hyva-compatibility module to activate the integration Grouper Options module with Hyva Theme
suggest.amasty/module-shop-by-filter-highlight: Install this package in order to use custom filter highlight color functionality
suggest.amasty/shop-by-redirect: Install this package to enable 301 redirect for SEO-optimized Urls functionality
suggest.amasty/module-shopby-setting-export-enti: Install this package for Export compatibility
suggest.amasty/module-shopby-setting-import-enti: Install this package for Import compatibility
suggest.amasty/shop-by-brand-widget: Install this package in order to manage Slider Widget Brands.
